abstract: Advertising column; DHL Express, along with shipping rivals UPS and FedEx, are rolling out advertising campaigns that emphasize their international service to American customers.
snippet: DHL Express’s new marketing campaign seeks to persuade American companies to sign up for its international shipping expertise.
lead_paragraph: DHL Express’s new marketing campaign seeks to persuade American companies to sign up for its international shipping expertise.

headline.main: Shippers Are Jostling for Greater Global Share
headline.print_headline: Shippers Are Jostling For Greater Global Share
headline.seo: Shippers Vie for Greater Global Share - Advertising
